report.title: Habitats For Parent Sample
report.description: Returns a list of habitats for a given sample.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM samples s LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav on sav.sample_id=s.id AND sav.sample_attribute_id=#description_attr_id# AND sav.deleted='f' WHERE s.parent_id=#parent_sample_id# AND s.deleted=false

param.name: parent_sample_id
param.description: ID of the parent sample to load values for

param.name: description_attr_id
param.description: ID of the attribute that holds habitat descriptions.
